Other Details: Silonijan - Bamboo Foot Bridge | Bamboo Bridge number 5/1 under PWD Borpathar Roads Division. Location: Kathar Chandra Engti Village Upper Deopani, P.S Barpathar , Silonijan Rev. Circle. Causeway damaged and temporary bamboo bridge over the Upper Deopani River washed away due to rain and over flow of river water. Length of the bridge 70.00M. Longitude:93.768929 Latitude:26.22887. Date of occurrence 01-06-2022 and reported by EE PWD (R), Borpathar to DEOC Karbi Anglong.
